message: Let's start fair. I take 60%, you take 40%.  This way we both get a good chunk of the money.
I think we can do better than 60-40. How about 55-45? It's still a good deal for you, considering the money is worth 20% less for you in each round.
I'm willing to split it evenly this time. It's better for both of us than what you offered, and we don't need to risk further inflation.
Considering the inflation, I think 60-40 is a fair deal now. You're losing more value to inflation than I am, so I believe this is a reasonable adjustment.
